title: Baby Carrier
description: upper and lower flannel panels; red; predominant scroll pattern in gold/tan and circles with green, purple, white and blue designs; separated by 2 1/2\" gold/white geomentric embroidery on red; floral border around top part; white/black border around lower half; blue denim lining; five short twisted strings spaced along top
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
